sentences.sContent: The sun came over the mountains to the east. Temperatures reached 40 degrees at 11am and stayed there for ages.
sentences.sContent_eng: The sun came over the mountains to the east. Temperatures reached 40 degrees at 11am and stayed there for ages.
sentences.sCn: 太阳从东边的山上升起，气温在上午11点就升到了40度，并在很长时间里一直保持着。
